title: Sell Blackadder Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Blackadder Whisky | Raw Cask & Snake Label | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Blackadder whisky. We buy the Raw Cask series (with barrel sediment) and legendary snake label releases.
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for Blackadder Raw Cask and Chimera.
introParagraph: Blackadder Raw Cask is famous for bottling whisky 'straight from the cask'—complete with charcoal and barrel sediment floating in the bottle. This authenticity makes them a cult favorite.
photoChecklist: Close up of sediment (to prove it's Raw Cask)
conditionFactors: Sediment: 'Charcoal' in the bottle is a FEATURE of Raw Cask, not a defect. Do not shake it.
Cork: Raw Cask bottles are notoriously filled to the brim. Leaks are common in shipping. Pack upright.
pricingFactors: Distillery: Islay Raw Casks (Laphroaig, Bowmore) are top tier.
ABV: Often extreme (60%+), which collectors love.
Amrut: Blackadder often bottles Amrut (Indian Whisky); we buy these too.
Series: 'The Old Man of Hoy' and other rare labels.

faqs.question: Why is there dirt in my bottle?
faqs.answer: That is 'cask sediment' (charcoal). Blackadder Raw Cask filters only through a coarse sieve. It is safe to drink.

faqs.question: Do you buy Red Snake?
faqs.answer: Yes, Red Snake and Black Snake are solera vatting series. We buy them.

faqs.question: What is Blairfindy?
faqs.answer: It is usually Glenfarclas teaspooned or undisclosed family cask stock. Very good sherry whisky.

faqs.question: Do you buy 'Peat Reek'?
faqs.answer: Yes, Blackadder Peat Reek is a staple purchase.

faqs.question: Is Drop of the Irish valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, Irish single casks are hot right now.

faqs.question: How do I ship a Raw Cask?
faqs.answer: Wrap the neck tightly with electrical tape (over the capsule) to prevent the cork from popping, and ship upright if possible.
